conversation.event: <0>speech</0> <1>This is a nice place, isn't it?</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>We matoran just get to build what we can, and be creative.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>I'd much rather be here than Ta Metru. They have it bad there.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>I mean, we even have an Akilini field to cool off after we work.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Yes, it's certainly better than some places I've seen.</1> <2>player</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>It's just luck that I ended up here.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
